article_title: Supreme Court's Battle Over Statutory Construction Will Determine Obamacare's Fate

article_metadata.author: Michael Bobelian

og.description: As the Supreme Court heard oral arguments in King v. Burwell today, much of the political debate centered around whether the judicial body's five conservative jurists would deliver a fatal blow to the Affordable Care Act three years after the law barely survived the Court's scrutiny. Unlike the previous case, which [...]
